channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A ‘Housing Trust Fund’ is on New Orleans ballots next month. What do voters need to know?
item.description: A ballot measure aims to address the affordable housing crisis in New Orleans by creating a Housing Trust Fund.

item.title: Central Park Five sues Donald Trump for ‘defamatory’ remarks made at presidential debate
item.description: The men formerly known as the Central Park Five before they were exonerated are suing Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump.

item.title: Book Reviews: Two new books raise big concerns about innocent men in our prisons
item.description: Two new books take a deeply troubling look at the wrongly convicted in our prisons, many languishing for decades.
